trait.name: Hold Breath
text: The kryt can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Prophetic Vision (1/Turn)
text: The kryt catches a glimpse of the immediate future and gains advantage on one attack roll or one saving throw.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The kryt makes three attacks. one with its bite and two with its quarterstaff.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage Quarterstaff. Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, or 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

reaction.name: Haunting Vision
text: When a kryt is attacked by a creature it can see within 30 feet of it, the kryt can haunt the creature with a vision of the creature's death. The haunted creature has disadvantage on its next attack roll. Undead creatures and creatures that are unable to be killed are immune to this reaction.
